comment.author: 8963119@N07
comment._content: This is a rare photo of Electric Bogie Water Sprinkler tram, as built c.1912-14. Used by N.S.W. Govt. tramways to water streets to lay the dust, before sealing of street surfaces.

comment.author: 53789748@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Australian Pictorials, please join our group and we'd love to have this added to the group and website with others from your collection please!
